reason: Answer faithfully reflects source text from page 283 about 사교육업체 범위 및 업무. Source text verified against markdown. Question is reasonable.

QUESTION_TOPIC_NOT_ON_PAGE - question asks broadly about 기간제교원 regulations but page 283 only mentions 기간제교원 once in passing ('기간제교원 포함'). DUPLICATE_ANSWER with q_4_0461 - same source text, nearly identical answer. Misleading source title.
